extendedInfo.description: A mix between the classic Tetris and the gameplay of the typical games (match 3) such as Jewels. If you liked the old game Columns or you want to give a try to a new mix between jewels and Tetris, this adaptation will give you almost the same feelings.In this new version there are two game modes to choose:- Arcade: Play until the pieces reach the screen top, just like the classic game.- Time Trial: Play for 3, 5 or 10 minutes and try to get the max score worldwide.There are, also, almost 80 achievements to unlock, do you think you can unlock them all, prove it!!How to play:Each of the pieces that appear are formed by three jewels which can be rotated by pressing the button on the right side. Our goal is to match three or more jewels of the same type both horizontally, vertically or diagonally.Move the piece (with the gamepad located in the bottom left corner) and place it in the correct position to match the types or locate the piece taking into account the next to appear (shown in the upper left corner).Further information about the game on the web page.

reviews.comment: Trying to get used to it again on tablet, preffered it on the Sega mega drive? A bit too old for it now I reckon..
reviews.author: Yvonne Morrison

reviews.title: You remind me of Columns...
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe I can\'t play Columns again... I was thinking of attempting to emulate whatever you can play it on, but this... Maybe I won\'t emulate now, your app does the job! Now I don\'t need to play Columns or Jewelry on an emulator, but where did my 7 stars go? SwiftKey hasn\'t gotten any stars available for shooting
reviews.author: Baka Tenshi

reviews.title: Columns challenge
reviews.comment: Very addicting so if you don\'t have a couple hours don\'t start. Love it

reviews.title: Entertaining, needs work
reviews.comment: No music Glitches with controls  Otherwise great game
reviews.author: Rebecca Zwettler

reviews.title: Irritating
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed this when I first installed it. Now, there are so many pop ups asking me to download this thing or rate it or install that thing that I just can\'t take it anymore. My nostalgia is not so great that I need to keep this when it nags me to rate. I already rated! Because of this constant pestering, you lost stars! I would give you 0 ifI could! Terrble!
reviews.author: Ariane Broome-Hopkins

reviews.title: High level improvement
reviews.comment: Well done on media effect. High level speed too slow for hardcore players.  Control key could be slightly bigger for cell phone users just like me.  Level selection would be highly recommended for various players.
